title: Coronavirus update: Indian officials blast migrants with disinfectant
description: Migrant workers in India are drenched with disinfectant by health workers wielding high-pressure hoses, while in Spain, confirmed COVID-19 cases surpass China's.
content:
Updated 
March 31, 2020 04:54:49
More than 741,000 people have been infected by the novel coronavirus globally and more than 35,000 have died.
This story is being updated regularly. You can also stay informed with the latest episode of the Coronacast podca… [+8606 chars]
